thread.title: Donald Trump walks back part of order as thousands take to Copley to protest
thread.title_full: Donald Trump walks back part of order as thousands take to Copley to protest

author: Antonio Planas
title: Donald Trump walks back part of order as thousands take to Copley to protest

organizations.name: boston protest against the muslim ban

text: Antonio Planas Monday, January 30, 2017 Credit: Nicolaus Czarnecki MAKING THEIR VOICES HEARD: Thousands gather in Copley Square, above, to rally against President Trump’s recent executive order on travel. Credit: Angela Rowlings Izzy Berdan demonstrates during the Boston Protest Against the Muslim Ban and Anti-Immigration Orders at Copley Square, Sunday, January 29, 2017. Staff photo by Angela Rowlings. Credit: Nicolaus Czarnecki Thousands gather in Copley Square to rally against the recent Muslim ban, in Boston, on Sunday, January 29, 2017. Staff Photo by Nicolaus Czarnecki Credit: Angela Rowlings Kevser Guleryuz, a Turkish woman studying for her Master's degree in Cambridge, prays during the Boston Protest Against the Muslim Ban and Anti-Immigration Orders at Copley Square, Sunday, January 29, 2017. Staff photo by Angela Rowlings. Credit: Angela Rowlings TAKING ACTION: Demonstrators take part in a protest yesterday in Copley Square against President Trump’s executive order restricting travel from seven countries. Staff photo by Angela Rowlings. Credit: Nicolaus Czarnecki Thousands gather in Copley Square to rally against the recent Muslim ban, in Boston, on Sunday, January 29, 2017. Staff Photo by Nicolaus Czarnecki Credit: Nicolaus Czarnecki Thousands gather in Copley Square to rally against the recent Muslim ban, in Boston, on Sunday, January 29, 2017. Staff Photo by Nicolaus Czarnecki Credit: Nicolaus Czarnecki Thousands gather in Copley Square to rally against the recent Muslim ban, in Boston, on Sunday, January 29, 2017. Staff Photo by Nicolaus Czarnecki Credit: Angela Rowlings The crowd puts up their hands when asked who is Muslim during the Boston Protest Against the Muslim Ban and Anti-Immigration Orders at Copley Square, Sunday, January 29, 2017.
